providers.description: People Incorporated of Virginia offers free income tax preparation services through the Volunteer Income Tax Assistance (VITA) program. IRS-certified volunteers prepare and electronically file federal and state tax returns for eligible individuals and families. The program helps ensure taxpayers receive all eligible credits, including the Earned Income Tax Credit (EITC) and Child Tax Credit, and avoids costly commercial tax preparation fees.
providers.eligibility:
You are eligible for free tax preparation if you meet one of the following criteria:

Make less than $89,000 annually
Have a disability
Speak limited English
Other qualifying criteria (call 276-619-2235 with questions)
providers.name: Free Income Tax Preparation
